titles.title: I Can Run Through A Troop

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can run through a troop
And leap over a wall.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's my strength and my song.
He's my All in all.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
He's the Rock of my salvation.
There is now no condemnation.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I can run through a troop
And leap over a wall.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
